node.text:
La Perla invites you to a digital styling event. 
Hosted by @NatalieSalmon, Social Media Editor of Harper’s Bazaar UK. 
Join us to learn about the current trends, with exclusive insight into Natalie’s working-from-home wardrobe and what’s keeping her inspired.

Links to all La Perla items featured below.

node.text: This is La Perla in the 60s. Flawless, fresh and fiercely feminine. We mixed pioneering fabrics with a colourful, playful spirit to create swimwear that was a game-changing antidote to the traditional shapes that had come before - all the better to empower the free-spirited women who wore them so well. Shot by Studio Martelli. #LaPerla

node.text: This is La Perla in the 1980s. Daring, defiantly feminine and never knowingly understated. Irresistibly glamorous, high-impact shapes that revealed and concealed in equal measure, all the better to enhance and empower La Perla's game-changing women. Shot by Marco Emili. #LaPerla
